      • getChapsFactoryType

        private java.lang.reflect.Type getChapsFactoryType(java.lang.Class<?> theClass)
        Returns the Type representing the implemented ChapsFactory for this class. Useful for getting the concrete type parameter, if one exists.
        Returns:
        The type representing the implemented ChapsFactory interface, or null if it can't be found
